verbs.description: < p > With a holstered handgun next to her on a kitchen table , [ARG0: Republican U.S. Senate candidate Leah Vukmir] [V: promises] [ARG2: in her first television ad of the campaign released Monday to stand with President Donald Trump just as she did against death threats in] Wisconsin.</p >

< p > With a holstered handgun next to her on a kitchen table , Republican U.S. Senate candidate Leah Vukmir promises in [ARG1: her first television ad of the campaign] [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] to stand with President Donald Trump just as she did against death threats in Wisconsin.</p >

< p > With a holstered handgun next to her on a kitchen table , [ARG1: Republican U.S. Senate candidate Leah Vukmir] promises in her first television ad of the campaign released Monday to [V: stand] [ARG2: with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: just as she did against death threats] in Wisconsin.</p >

< p > With a holstered handgun next to her on a kitchen table , Republican U.S. Senate candidate Leah Vukmir promises in her first television ad of the campaign released Monday to stand with President Donald Trump just as she [V: did] against death threats in Wisconsin.</p >
